description.value:
You can divide your attention three ways when hunting. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Hunt Prey]{Hunt Prey}, you can designate three creatures as prey, designate two creatures as prey and share the effect with one ally (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Shared Prey]{Shared Prey}), or designate one creature as prey and share the effect with two allies.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}
